duties_responsibilities.duty: Accurately and efficiently cook and assemble dishes that meet culinary standards.
Maintain understanding of cooking times and temperatures as dictated by Chef Team.
Maintain an understanding of proper kitchen opening and closure protocol.
Handle, store, and rotate all product properly.
Report to scheduled shifts, meetings, and events on time and ready to work.
Maintain a clean and sanitary workstation and area.
Responsible for bringing personal cutlery tools/knife roll.
Maintain a clean and efficient station.
Manage and prioritize tasks by shift.
